title: Master .NET Full Stack Development with UNIQ Technologies
subtitle: Become a professional .NET Full Stack Developer with UNIQ Technologies. Learn C#, .NET Core (ASP.NET Core), Entity Framework, SQL Server, REST APIs, and frontend development with React. This hands-on course prepares you to build scalable full-stack applications and become industry-ready with real-time project experience and placement support.

afterCompleted.title: Job Opportunities after .NET Full Stack Course
afterCompleted.description: After completing our .NET Full Stack Developer Course, learners can apply for multiple high-demand roles across IT service and product companies. .NET Core and Azure are rapidly growing, creating strong job openings for full-stack developers.

faq.question: What is the .NET Full Stack Developer course?
faq.answer: The .NET Full Stack Course trains you in both backend and frontend development. You will learn C#, ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework, SQL Server, REST APIs, and React. By the end of this training, you can build complete enterprise-level web applications.

faq.question: Who can learn this course?
faq.answer: Engineering, Arts & Science graduates, diploma students, freshers, job seekers, and working professionals can join. No prior programming knowledge required.

faq.question: What job roles can I apply for?
faq.answer: You can apply for .NET Developer, Full Stack Developer (.NET + React), C# Developer, Application Developer, Backend Developer (.NET Core), or Software Engineer.

faq.question: What technologies will I learn?
faq.answer: C#, .NET Core, ASP.NET MVC, Entity Framework Core, SQL Server, LINQ, REST API, React JS, GitHub, Authentication, Authorization, and basic Azure deployment.

faq.question: How long is the course?
faq.answer: The duration is 4â€“6 months depending on weekday/weekend batch selection. Every module includes hands-on practice.

faq.question: Does this course include placement support?
faq.answer: Yes! UNIQ Technologies provides 100% placement support until you get placed with live interview calls every week.

faq.question: Can I rejoin if I do not understand a topic?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You can rejoin any future batch at no additional cost. Lifetime learning access is included.

faq.question: Is online training available?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer both online and offline training with live instructor-led classes.

faq.question: Can I switch from online to offline later?
faq.answer: Yes. You can switch at any time without extra fees.

faq.question: Is .NET still in demand?
faq.answer: Yes! .NET Core, Azure, and microservices are in high demand across enterprise companies and startups.

faq.question: Will I get a certificate?
faq.answer: Yes, you will receive Course Completion and Internship Certificates recognized by top IT companies.

faq.question: Why choose UNIQ Technologies?
faq.answer: Experienced mentors, real-time projects, lifetime access, continuous placement support, and thousands of successful students.

faq.question: How can I enroll?
faq.answer: Visit www.uniqjobs.co.in or contact our Chennai/Bangalore branches to book a free demo session.
